short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy-paste more and faster with three clipboards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copycat helps you copy-paste more elements of a page faster using three clipboards, to avoid going back and forth between tabs. 

It is designed to enhance your browsing experience, especially for those who are working simultaneously on different platforms all day long.

The simple interface of Copycat allows you to see whatâ€™s inside your clipboards at any time without compromising the accessibility of your pages.
